item.title: Time Series
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) This next data vizualization is a time series. For this we are extracting data about Babe Ruthâ€™s Homerun totals throughout his career. query<-"select yearID,HR from Batting where playerID='ruthba01'" result<-sqldf(query) For this graph we are actually putting two graphs on top of each other: a line graph and a scatterplot. It makes it easier to make sense of the representation of this data. ggplot()+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ ggtitle("Ruth's Homerun Totals Throughout the Years")+ xlab("year")+ ylab("homeruns")
